data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Su, Junyan, Li, Limei, Yang, Yuxia, Yang, Xingke (2015): A new species of Themus (Themus) Motschulsky from Yunnan, China and a redescription of T. (T.) testaceicollis Wittmer, 1983 (Coleoptera, Cantharidae). ZooKeys 525: 107-116, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.525.6021, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.525.6021
